name: 2D Shooter Tutorial (Birchbeek)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter tutorial build.  For the final build, I'm going to modify a few things. I'm not positive what those will be yet, but things I've thought about are:

- Adding an additional level

- Reskinning some graphics

- And modifying the in-game menus

Created by: Bradey Haulenbeek
